Name: Angel Scarf
LongDescription: Boosts maximum HP. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Togepi, Togetic, and Togekiss.  You can get an Angel Scarf at the Croagunk Swap Shop by swapping: a Togepi Dew, a Togepi Card, and a Pure Heart. That's the easy way!  An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
